subject: Hockey, Ice
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Krutov played on teams that won gold medals in the 1984 and 1988 Olympics and a silver medal in 1980, when the United States defeated the Soviets in the Miracle on Ice game at Lake Placid.
snippet: Krutov played on teams that won gold medals in the 1984 and 1988 Olympics and a silver medal in 1980, when the United States defeated the Soviets in the Miracle on Ice game at Lake Placid.
